items.text: a big sweep, it's gone high, and it lands safely wide of deep midwicket. Also stops on the field after bouncing and they get two
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: fullish delivery and he chips it down the ground without much power
items.shortText: Samiullah Shinwari to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Birthday boy Rashid Khan is here. A slip for Shakib
items.text: starts with a short and flat delivery outside off, he tucks it away for one
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: A slip for Mahmudullah too, fine leg and third man in the circle
items.text: full toss towards the pads and it's easily pushed down to long on
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: it's the googly outside off, Shakib goes back and steers it into the covers
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: loud appeal for lbw as it's the wrong'un for Mahmudullah. Forward lean, not reading the googly and this one is turning too much
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: another googly, this one looks closer, umpire says not out again and this time Rashid reviews. A forward lunge again, the ball turns in from off and middle and it hits him in front of leg but it's umpire's call. Mahmudullah survives, Afghanistan don't lose the review
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: a third wrong'un from outside off this time, he stretches out and defends with soft hands towards point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: slightly wide outside off, Shakib goes for a big swing and gets a single to the right of mid off
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: angling in from outside off, he defends it carefully
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: too wide outside off, he chases it and sends it square of the wicket for two
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: flicked with the wrists this time by using the angle and the ball just evades midwicket
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: he angles it in towards middle and leg again, this time Mahmudullah finds midwicket who dives to his left
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: some width to end the over, he slashes at it and backward point dives to his left to stop it this time
items.postText: Nisar: "Seriously? Just 1 boundary in 20 Overs!? What are the Bangladeshi's facing today? A line-up of McGrath, Warne, Murali, Steyn and Marshall in a Test match?" It's the second-lowest score since 2012 for Bangladesh at the end of 20 overs
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, driven firmly to cover
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: flat legbreak outside off, he goes back to see which way it's turning and steers it wide of cover point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: loud, loud appeal, this one beats Shakib completely for pace and Rod Tucker raises the finger. Bangladesh don't have a review left and they shouldn't have used it anyway. Flat and quick on middle and leg, Shakib goes back and is a bit too late to bring his bat down, the ball skids off to hit on the pad right in front of the middle stump and the keeper and Rashid scream in celebration
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan lbw b Rashid Khan 32 (55b 0x4 0x6) SR: 58.18

items.preText: There's a leg gully in place
items.text: flighted on off stump, Mosaddek leans forward and blocks it
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: flighted again on the stumps, he blocks it carefully again
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: he's teasing him with that line. It's outside off, Mosaddek is maybe expecting a google an stays inside the line of the ball and the it turns past his outside edge
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: bit too short with the angle, Mahmudullah pulls it from waist length to long leg
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: similar length and this one stays a bit low, tucked away off the pads to long leg again
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mosaddek Hossain, 2 runs

items.text: betters his line to bring it towards middle stump and the batsman defends it to leg
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: a length delivery towards the off stump now, pushed back towards mid off
items.postText: Vishal: "Very happy to see Afghanistan playing good cricket and giving tough time to established teams. HongKong played very good cricket. Asia cup is no longer for just 2-3 teams. Way to go minnows...."
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: a cutter at 107kmh, Mosaddek drives it away from the body and gets an inside edge past the stumps on the leg side
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run
